name: SmartActivityPicker
0:
”Alexa, open smart activity picker”
”Alexa, start smart activity picker”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart activity picker
des: Next time you're trying to decide how to spend your free time at home, just ask Alexa to pick an activity for you in either the Productivity or Gaming category. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
